title: Implement microservices health monitoring system
description: Build comprehensive health monitoring that tracks microservice status, performance metrics, and dependency health with automated alerting and recovery procedures
iWant: real-time microservices health monitoring with automated recovery
soThat: I can detect service failures within 2 minutes and maintain 99.9% system availability
acceptanceCriteria: Health checks execute every 30 seconds for all microservices
Service failures are detected and reported within 2 minutes
Automated recovery procedures restart failed services automatically
Performance metrics dashboard shows real-time service health status
